items.content_html: Lightweight utilities for inspecting and manipulating video container formats.
items.title: videojs/mux.js: Lightweight utilities for inspecting and manipulating video container formats.

items.content_html: Colorado is a lightweight, intuitive and dependency free JavaScript library for handling and converting color values. Seamlessly switch between RGB and Hex formats with simple methods and generate clean string outputs for your web projects.
items.title: avolutions/colorado: Colorado is a lightweight, intuitive and dependency free JavaScript library for handling and converting color values. Seamlessly switch between RGB and Hex formats with simple methods and generate clean string outputs for your web projects.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript UI building library that prioritizes transparency and direct access to native browser features.
items.title: DeepDoge/purify.js: A lightweight JavaScript UI building library that prioritizes transparency and direct access to native browser features.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
